item.title: [p30a] Urza, Prince of Kroog
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

{6}: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control, except it's a 1/1 Soldier creature in addition to its other types.

item.title: [pw22] Thought Vessel
item.description:
Artifact

You have no maximum hand size.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [gdy] Braids, Arisen Nightmare
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Nightmare

At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Staff of Titania
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Forests you control.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 1/1 green Forest Dryad land creature token. (It's affected by summoning sickness.)

Equip {3}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xP8VuVCNkdk

item.title: [brr] Mesmeric Orb
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.

item.title: [brr] Mystic Forge
item.description:
Artifact

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

item.title: [brr] Springleaf Drum
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [brr] Soul-Guide Lantern
item.description:
Artifact

When Soul-Guide Lantern enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

{T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Sigil of Valor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [brr] Semblance Anvil
item.description:
Artifact

Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.

Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [brr] Self-Assembler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Sculpting Steel
item.description:
Artifact

You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

item.title: [brr] Scrap Trawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

item.title: [brr] Runechanter's Pike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

Equip {2}

item.title: [brr] Quietus Spike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has deathtouch.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

Equip {3}

item.title: [brr] Psychosis Crawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [brr] Pristine Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

item.title: [brr] Precursor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.

Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

item.title: [brr] Platinum Angel
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Angel

Flying

You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

item.title: [brr] Phyrexian Processor
item.description:
Artifact

As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.

{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

item.title: [brr] Well of Lost Dreams
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

item.title: [brr] Unwinding Clock
item.description:
Artifact

Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

item.title: [brr] Sword of the Meek
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+2.

Equip {2}

Whenever a 1/1 creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Sword of the Meek from your graveyard to the battlefield, then attach it to that creature.

item.title: [brr] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Equip {1}

item.title: [brr] Sundering Titan
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Sundering Titan enters or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

item.title: [brr] Staff of Domination
item.description:
Artifact

{1}: Untap Staff of Domination.

{2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

{3}, {T}: Untap target creature.

{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.

{5}, {T}: Draw a card.

item.title: [brc] Tawnos, Solemn Survivor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

{2}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact token you control. Mill two cards.

{1}{W}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice two artifact tokens, Exile an artifact or creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [brc] Ashnod the Uncaring
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Deathtouch

Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact or creature that isn't a mana ability, if one or more permanents were sacrificed to activate it, you may copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Sacrificing an artifact for mana to activate an ability doesn't count.)

item.title: [bro] Hostile Negotiations
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top three cards of your library in a face-down pile, then exile the next top three cards of your library in another face-down pile. Look at the cards in each pile, then turn a pile of your choice face up. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put all cards in the chosen pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life.

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/kImRHHR0NoM

item.title: [bro] Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Druid Scout

{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells or activate abilities of a creature or creature card.

Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Gwenna, Eyes of Gaea and untap it.

https://twitter.com/aishawakatsuki/status/1588128816308064257

item.title: [bro] Fauna Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Elf Shaman

{G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

https://bleedingcool.com/games/magic-the-gathering-the-brothers-war-exclusive-preview-card/

item.title: [bro] Titania's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Exile target player's graveyard. You gain 1 life for each card exiled this way.

• Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

• Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens.

• Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [bro] Teething Wurmlet
item.description:
Creature — Wurm

Teething Wurmlet has deathtouch as long as you control three or more artifacts.

Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. If this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Teething Wurmlet.

https://www.ausgamers.com/news/read/3643017/magic-the-gathering-the-brothers-war-exclusive-card-reveal

item.title: [bro] Cityscape Leveler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Trample

When you cast this spell and whenever Cityscape Leveler attacks, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a tapped Powerstone token.

Unearth {8}

item.title: [bro] Bladecoil Serpent
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Serpent

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {U}{U} spent to cast it, draw a card.

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {B}{B} spent to cast it, each opponent discards a card.

When Bladecoil Serpent enters the battlefield, for each {R}{R} spent to cast it, it gets +1/+0 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/TheM4ng0/status/1587852273501216769

item.title: [brr] Adaptive Automaton
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

item.title: [brr] Aetherflux Reservoir
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life for each spell you've cast this turn.

Pay 50 life: Aetherflux Reservoir deals 50 damage to any target.

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Caged Sun
item.description:
Artifact

As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color.

Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

Whenever a land's ability causes you to add one or more mana of the chosen color, add one additional mana of that color.

item.title: [brr] Cloud Key
item.description:
Artifact

As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.

Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color.

When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Door to Nothingness
item.description:
Artifact

Door to Nothingness enters the battlefield tapped.

{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

Artifact

When Elsewhere Flask enters the battlefield, draw a card.
